resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

1. TechRace Android App will be given to you before the race.
 2. One Android Phone per team is a must. 3. An active internet data pack must be on at all times during the race in the Android phone being used in the race.
 4. NO Private Transport of any sorts can be used in order to maintain parity among all participants. Use of any such means will lead to immediate disqualification.
 5. Completely charge the phone to be used by the team and Carry a power bank. (Recommended)
 6. Do not clutter in or around a particular location once you get the next clue. Be on the move.
 7. Carry enough cash to get around the city
 8. Stay safe on roads and do not run around.
 9.Buy train tickets when travelling by local trains to avoid unnecessary trouble.(We recommend to carry ATVM smart cards)
 10. Refreshments will be provided in the morning but bring food and water for when you get deep into the race.
 11. Any sort of cheating caught by our team will lead to direct disqualification
 12. Follow traffic rules
 13. Decision of the organizing committee is final in case of any dispute.
 14. Carry your umbrellas in case it rains.
Ask a volunteer or organizer to input code manually.
Tap here to input code manually
